thread.title: Poll: Which weather would you rather have — 70s in February or snow days?
thread.title_full: Poll: Which weather would you rather have — 70s in February or snow days?

author: Angela Fritz
title: Poll: Which weather would you rather have — 70s in February or snow days?
text:
By Angela Fritz By Angela Fritz February 23 at 2:40 PM Follow @angelafritz (Josh Lorenzo/Flickr) 
Did you have lunch outside today? Are you planning on a bike ride later? Maybe a social excursion to the local pub patio. The weather is great! Right? 
Honestly, would you rather have a snow day — ie. you don’t have to work and your kids don’t have to go to school, but you’re stuck at home because the roads are impassable? @capitalweather If it wasn't so warm out, they'd be sad. But getting to play outside in short sleeves makes up for it. 
— (((Jesse Ellis))) (@bomberterp) February 21, 2017 
I love snow so much, but this weather is nice. I can sense my skin absorbing the vitamin D and I swear I’m not as tired during the day. But I know this is not how everyone feels. Which would you rather have? User Poll Results: Voting is closed on this poll 
You pick.
